lead_paragraph: FOLEY--Rita. March 30, 2016. The Board of Directors and the staff of Pro Mujer are greatly saddened at the passing of Rita Foley, former Chair of Pro Mujer's Board of Directors. Rita was deeply devoted to the work of Pro Mujer and our mission of empowering the underserved women of Latin America to realize their full potential. Her long standing commitment to the women we serve has been an inspiration to all of us. We extend our heartfelt sympathy to Rita's children Michael and Nathaniel Buckley, to her sister Patricia DiSilvio and to the entire Buckley and Foley families for their profound loss. Gail Landis, Chair of the Board Maria Cavalcanti, President & CEO Lynne Patterson, Co-founder Pro Mujer 1/3
